name: OMN
short_description:
OMN - OPEN MASSIVE NETWORK

Is the php coded Community Support Sistem for OMNI Sistem

OMNIS Projects are the delivering of Open Sourçe Communitarian Game Development, Code Assets & Resources for the Delivering of Open Source Rpg Chose Your Way Games , Delivering Open, Sources & Code Within Various Game platforms as CRYENGINE / UDK / UNITY / TORQUE / RYZOM / MYST / BIG WORLD / GAMEBRIO / PROFENIX S2 / Among others.

Within a Deep Ramification Online Open Communitarian Artistic Development Structure the OMNIS Project Promises To Revolution The Open Development On-line Universes.
summary: OMN - OPEN MASSIVE NETWORK / Php Community code for the OMNI UNIVERSE
